item.title: Automate Crypto Portfolio Using Google Sheets
item.description: Today I will show you how to create a makeshift Google Sheet in order to pull pricing and totals for your portfolio in your favourite currencies. First, browse to sheets.google.com Then, name your sheet and save it. Now, to fill out the sheet. Make sure the very first row of your sheet just has labels and fiat currencies you want to get rates for. For example, my first row has labels: Coins, Qty, USD, CAD, JPY.
